settings.title: Website Disclaimer.
settings.desc1: We take great price in our commitment to the quality of our products and services offered.  All products have third-party lab analysis and are available at the time of purchase.  You can be assured that you are getting high-quality products at pricing below your typical market rates.
settings.desc2:
Free Shipping is available on all orders over $99.  For products under $99, a shipping fee will vary depending on the product ordered and size and weight.  Shipping is available within the United States. 

All shipments will be sent via USPS and should be delivered in 2-5 business days. We do not ship on weekends or holidays. Please allow 2-4 days for delivery. Larger bulk orders are shipped via UPS.

NOTE: You must be at least 21 years of age or older OR of legal age in your state/area to purchase this product.

We cannot ship or sell this product to the following states: Alaska, Arizona, Arkansas, Delaware, Idaho, Iowa, Mississippi, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, Utah, and West Virginia. We do not ship internationally. If your order was placed with a shipping address in one of these states or any other area we discover is unlawful, we reserve the right to refund your order without shipping the product.
settings.update: *this statement is subjective to change by State to State. This was last updated on 05.04.2022

settings.title: AGE RESTRICTED WEBSITE:
settings.subtitle: NOT FOR SALE TO MINORS
settings.desc:
Products sold by Organna LLC, and subsidiaries have not been evaluated by the FDA nor are they intended to treat, prevent, or cure any disease or condition. Follow us on your favorite social media sites.

Organna CBD products are not intended to diagnose, treat, mitigate, cure, or prevent any ailment, disease, or other conditions.

Organna CBD products are not intended to administer medicinal or illegal products of any kind and are not intended for use with any substance that may affect the structure or any function of the body. If you have any health problems consult your doctor or pharmacist before using.

 

​The products on the Organna CBD website are not designed, nor intended for use with any material that is not lawful, allergenic, or poisonous or may cause harm.

​The lawful and proper use of every product on this site is a condition of sale.

​Any improper use of the products on this site is prohibited. Any illegal use of these products could subject the user to severe fines, penalties and/or imprisonment under the laws of your jurisdiction

​All comments and testimonials presented, in any form, by customers are not and do not represent the opinions of the manufacturers.

​All smoking accessory products from the Organna CBD website are intended to be used solely with legal hemp flower plant material.

​ALL OF THE PRODUCTS ON THIS WEBSITE DO NOT CONTAIN TOBACCO OR MARIJUANA (CANNABIS PLANT MATERIAL WITH TOTAL THC GREATER THAN 0.3% BY MASS).
settings.desc2: The statements made regarding these products have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. The efficacy of these products has not been confirmed by FDA-approved research. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. All information presented here is not meant as a substitute for or alternative to information from health care practitioners. Please consult your health care professional about potential interactions or other possible complications before using any product. The Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act require this notice.
settings.desc3:
Organna LLC. is honored to operate as an entity that observes and adheres to Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act with being ADA compliant.

OSOM Distribution, OSOM Brands and Organna CBD is an advocate for the ethnic standard of equal access for consumers with disabilities as stated in the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) and Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act. Our team also consists of specialists who rigorously test the accessibility of the Organna CBD website and ensure that our online features and user experience is up-to-date and compatible with today’s most common assistive programs and mechanisms. If, during your visit to our website or use of services, you detect an inaccessible feature or asset, please use our “Support” page to report the issue.

When contacting us, please be as detailed as possible. Let us know:

  • What you were attempting to do
  • How you attempted it
  • Any potential or working solution if you may be familiar with

Feel free to send any accessibility questions that you may have to info@organnacbd.com

settings.title: American With Disabilities Act (ADA)
settings.content:
Smile Optics LLC. is honored to operate as an entity that observes and adheres to Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act with being ADA compliant.

​

Smile Optics LLC is an advocate for the ethnic standard of equal access for consumers with disabilities as stated in the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) and Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act. Our team also consists of specialists who rigorously test the accessibility of the Smile Optics website and ensure that our online features and user experience is up-to-date and compatible with today’s most common assistive programs and mechanisms. If, during your visit to our website or use of services, you detect an inaccessible feature or asset, please use our “Support” page to report the issue.

​​

When contacting us, please be as detailed as possible. Let us know:

  • What you were attempting to do
  • How you attempted it
  • Any potential or working solution if you may be familiar with

Feel free to send any accessibility questions that you may have to info@smileoptics.com
